Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Wedding at Cana of Galilee:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: afc~mou e~nimwou afaitou n~/rp: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, blessed the waters, and made them wine. Alleluia, Alleluia.
الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح ابن الله بارك المياه فصيرها خمرا.
